content:
That's wonderful! Including your own notes and stories will add an extra layer of love and personal connection to the album. As Ethan's aunt, you have a unique perspective on his arrival and growth, and sharing your favorite memories and stories will help him feel loved and cherished.

It's beautiful that you're taking the time to create this special album for Ethan. It's a thoughtful way to celebrate his arrival and create a treasured keepsake that he can enjoy for years to come.

Remember, the most important thing is to have fun and be creative with the album! Don't worry too much about perfection – it's the thought and love behind it that matters.

If you have any more questions or need further ideas, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you have a wonderful time creating the album and enjoying the celebration with your family!
